About the Company: Murudeshwar Ceramics Limited is an India-based company. The Company is engaged in the manufacturing of ceramic and vitrified tiles. The Company operates in three segments: Vitrified Tiles, Ceramic Tiles and Granite Slabs. During the fiscal year ended March 31, 2012 (fiscal 2012), the Company produced 34, 74,059 square meters of vitrified tiles, and 6,25,150 square meters of ceramics tiles. During fiscal 2012, the Company sold approximately 39, 27,205 square meters of vitrified tiles, and approximately 12, 41,942 square meters of ceramic tiles..The company also engagged in the business of Ceramic, Trading, Services, Vitrified.
